ing: 1 (6 ounce) can frozen orange juice concentrate
2 cups vanilla ice cream, or to taste (optional)
1/4 cup whipped cream, or to taste (optional)
des: "This yummy blended drink is good for parties and also good for movie nights!"
ins:
Combine milk, water, sugar, orange juice concentrate, and vanilla extract in a blender. Cover with ice cubes and blend orange mixture on Low, gradually increasing to High, until smooth.
Cover the bottom of a mug with vanilla ice cream. Pour in orange mixture; top with remaining ice cream and whipped cream.
